page.title: 08Farming - Wayward Hill
page.content: I ( Hannah ) live on a sheep farm situated between the B2026 and Parrock Lane,Upper Hartfield. The farm is 52 acres; grass land 30 acres and wood land 22 acres.Our livestock consists of 250 sheep.We also have land for grazing and winter feed.We have a lake of one acre stocked with carp, rudd, roach and bream. The buildings consist of 1 farm house,2 barns,a cottage, 2 bungalows. Machinery: 1 tractor and a suzhia. The farm house was built in the 17th century. {Flora and Fauna} 80% oaks,also ash hawthorn,cherry and chestnut.We have lots of rabbits, foxes, squirrels, deer,grass snakes and moles. Summer visitors include Canada geese nesting on the pond, four goslings have hatched out so far.
